text: @realDonaldTrump @JudgeJeanine @foxandfriends You and @FoxNews are going on and on about your hurt feelings and your bullshit coronavirus cure, while the rest of media are covering the ecents in Minnesota. This shows how disconnected you are with the heart of our nation. #UnfitForOffice #NotOurPresident #BlueWave2020
